Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render

package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render
  • Class
    Description
    BackgroundImplement
    Handles loading and rendering a GIF background image from the "BackgroundImage" folder.
    BackgroundSoundImplement
    handles playing background sound effects using .wav files.
    ImageImplement
    responsible for rendering various game elements (tiles, items, actors, and boxes) onto a JPanel, as well as managing background sound and additional effects during the game.
    Img
    a singleton used to store and manage all the images used in the game.
    InfoImplement
    responsible for managing and displaying information messages on the game's JPanel when the player reaches certain locations.
    SoundEffectImplement
    responsible for managing and playing sound effects when certain actions occur in the game.
    WinLoseImplement
    responsible for handling the display of win/lose messages and playing corresponding sound effects when the player either wins or loses the game.
